Name: Grid Words
About the game: In Grid Words you are faced with a 5x5 grid of letter tiles that you must use to create 3, 4, or 5 letter words. Manipulate the grid by adding new tiles at the sides, which will slide the existing tiles along to create new words. You can see the next 5 tiles that you will be given, so plan ahead and try to make multiple words at the same time. The more words you make, the higher your score. You begin each game with a limited number of moves. Play for longer by earning additional moves as your score progresses. Your challenge awaitsâ€¦
